column5: LOL.. just so I dont have to send this to everyone individually, heres some pictures from our trip to Cuba..  we will be back next year for sure..   what a wonderful place....  http://www.mycubatrips.com  I put my back out late in the week, so it put the ki-bosh on much fishing... you should have seen the bartenders face when I gave him the rod, reel and tackle to keep... best part of the whole trip..  I did speak to some fishermen there... so al least I know the spots to check next year....
Awesome pics & good to have ya back bud !!
great shots,looks like an awesome vacation

Very cool, and brings back memories, my wife and I stayed at the same resort. We had a water level lagoon suite and caught numerous fish right off our back patio  . I know you're a cofee freak, how'd you like the coffee at the resort? To this day it's the best I've ever had...
looks like a great time tj.  sorry to hear about your back, but surely it wasnt anything you couldnt drink through. lol  jason
Drink through...lol  i was very lucky to find a guy with a very large bottle of Tylenol 3's...  add a bit of dark rum and..... it was tolerable...
My Gawd, Monique! What happened to your arms? They're so hairy! And get TJ to buy you a better watch.
you were gone??  Awesome pics! is it me or does TJ appear to get hairier with every season! while Monique get cuter  Welcome home boss!  G
Wow, looks like a great place.  A flying Zodiak - Cool.  Didn't look very crowded.  Are those sand people?  Cool of you to give the guy your rod TJ.  Very Generous.  Joey
You went somewhere?  LOL...great pics TJ...thanks for that link.  Looked like you had a great time...and had GREAT weather!  Welcome back...even if you don't really wanna be here.....hehe.
First picture on the right? snow as you were leaving Canada? Fishing rod and no fish? Just like a LakeAir report?  Glad ya`ll had a good time, great pictures of a land we can`t go to.
Very nice TJ. Looks like a great place.  Mike
Very nice.Looks very clean and tidy.Wish we could go there....maybe someday. Joe

Welcome Home!!     Thanks for the link to the photos TJ, gorgeous!!  Sorry to hear that you hurt your back...hope all is better now.   Looks like you had a well earned relaxing vacation.....hope you were able to bring back some of that coffee you like also....
Yah... but he didn't say what he was doin when he put that back out !  Welcome back to reality bud !
Some Nice Pics! Welcome Back!
I wish I had fish pics... just wasnt in the cards this time...  were already starting to save for next year... going right back!!
How many stars is that resort?

You could have used the gallery here at OFC to post your pics. Just as a heads up for next time, you don't need to go out and register a website to post your pics! (PM a moderator, they will explain how to upload pics)  Nice pics though and thanks for sharing!
....Ah very nice. Always good to see friends enjoying their holidays then making it home safely.
Great pics TJ.  Kinda reminds me a bit when we stayed on Ambergris Caye, Belieze.

Ahhh! the Alabastered skinned Canadians invade the Caribbean!!! Did anyone think y'all were tourists? Ya gotta love the color of the water and sand down there! Too bad you couldn't do more fishin' while you were down there, saltwater fishin' really is a blast when you get into it!  Glad you had a good time and got back safely!!!  Great report and pics!!!

A lot of its the same... beach, booze and palm trees, to me its the people who make the difference.   as for the site, i prefer to keep the gallery for fishing picts... mycubatrips.com is my own personal site...
Just awesome TJ.... I WILL make it down there one of these days too.. always wanted to visit Cuba...  Love the pic's.. thanks for sharing...  Glad your home safe...  Welcome back...
nice pics but who's the hairy, geeky guy with glasses?
